alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eastpoint, moving east at 20 mph. At 411 PM EDT/311 PM CDT, the Apalachicola Airport gusted to 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Franklin, Bay City, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Hays Place, and Green Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
